item.title: Leonard Susskind Physical Minimum Lectures on Youtube.
item.description:
Leo Susskind, one of the bright ones that brought us string theory, has an extensive collection of academic lectures as part of their Starnford’s Continuing Studies Series. I am pointing here to a web resource collecting all these lectures.

https://glenmartin.wordpress.com/home/leonard-susskinds-online-lectures/

Professor Susskind has also a blog at

http://susskindsblogphysicsforeveryone.blogspot.com

item.title: My first post!
item.description: Nothing much to add for the moment, just playing around with the authoring tool and Wercker.
